divs: Sighting Details At 3pm P.D.T. I heard many jet aircraft flying above my neighborhood. I went outside to see what was going on. I observed more than 8 aircraft flying above at a high rate of speed .There were all types of aircraft.I paused and looked up and then saw a rectangular object with red sides . As I looked up the object appeared to be high in the air and must have been large as the jets passed under "the object". As I stood in the driveway ,a mailtruck on its route pulled up next to my box. I asked the mailman if he had a moment to look and see if he could see anything.As he handed me my mail he agreed to take a look . As we stood in the driveway to my house the mailman said," oh yes I see it" . We stood there together for several minutes and then the mailman said " wow, look , it appears to be going up higher" . At that time we both observed the red color on the side of the object to glow really bright. Then there appeared to be a yellow flash in the middle of the object and the whole thing became bright. I asked the mailman his name and he replied ," Phillip". Then as we observed the object it darted sideways and startled us. I became so nervous I asked the mailman his name again. He appeared to beginning to become nervous also . He said he was getting out of here . As he left he grabbed a cellphone he began talking in a foreign language in a very "excited" manner . After that I went in to grab some binoculars ,came outside but whatever it was I could not find. For several hours jets flew from every direction over the area. My name is William J. Keller and I have a license from the State of Oregon as a Public Safety Standards and Training, Private Security Provider PSID : 32453 exp 9-01-2008 Pursuant to ORS 181.870-181.991
Summary: Open hearing jets overhead , observed rectangular object hovering.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around April 11th 2008
